channel.title: Impact 2.0
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/w9ya0j.png[/img][/CENTER]
[SIZE=36pt][COLOR=blue][B][U]Introduction:[/U][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE] Welcome to Impact 2.0! Impact 2.0 is based off of Impact - The next generation, and with this new Impact comes a new type of server. In Impact 2.0 I'm trying to replicate Runescape in the 420 era, but with small twists here and there. The server will have a lot of minigames, a lot of Runescape training areas, and most runescape skills.
[SIZE=36pt][COLOR=blue][B][U]Impact 2.0:[/U][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE] Impact 2.0 is being shaped in to the 'fun' runescape we all used to remember, but easier. All exp will be RuneScape exp * xp multiplier, I have not decided the value of multiplying xp yet but it will be fairly easier then hard. Most npc training areas will be how they are in RuneScape. Most minigames and quests will have RuneScape content in them and skills will be how you do them in Runescape. Below I will go in depth on the detail of the server.
[b]Server Progress:[/b]
[ul][*]Skills [list] [*]Runecrafting [list] [*]Added the Abyss [*]All rifts teleport you to the correct ruins for that rune [*]All rune levels, xp, and multipliers exact to RuneScape [/list] [*]Agility [list] [*]Added 100% gnome agility course [*]All correct animations for each obstacle. [*]All correct exp to RuneScape [/list] [*]Thieving [list] [*]All available stalls added [*]All correct levels and exp to RuneScape [*]If you are caught thieving a guard near by will attack you [URL=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=8x60hw&s=5](Video)[/URL] [/list] [*]Crafting [list] [*]All gems added to gem cutting [*]All correct exp and levels for gem cutting [*]Hide tanning and leather tanning [*]Hide crafting [/list] [*]Fletching [list] [*]All shortbow and longbow fletching [*]All arrow shafting and arrow head/feather attaching [*]Bow stringing [*]All correct animations, exp, and levels to RuneScape [/list] [*]Slayer [list] [*]Low level, Medium level, and High level tasks [/list] [*]Fishing [list] [*]Shrimp, trout, lobster, swordfish, shark, and manta ray's added [*]All correct requirements(trout requires feathers), levels, exp, and emotes to RuneScape [/list] [*]Cooking [list] [*]All fishable fish are cookable [*]All correct levels and exp to RuneScape [*]Burn rate almost exact to RuneScape [/list] [*]Woodcutting [list] [*]All trees added and cuttable [*]All axes with levels added [/list] [/list][/ul]
[ul][*]Minigames [list] [*]Duel Arena [list] [*]All correct rules [*]Staking [*]Forced chat [*]Arrow headicons [*]Forfeiting [*]Winning you stakes [/list] [*]Barrows [list] [*]All correct brothers in coffins [*]Aggressive brother with arrow headicon [*]All correct brother special effects [*]Last brother fought at chest [/list] [*]Fight Pits [list] [*]Waiting lobby with timers and interfaces [*]An all out free for all [*]Winner receives a tokkul reward and a red skull above their head [/list] [*]Clue Scrolls [list] [*]Very accurate 377 clue scroll rewards [/list] [/list][/ul]
[ul][*]Quests [list] [*]Recipe for Disaster [list] [*]Culinaromancer's chest [*]Sir Amik Varze with npc and player dialogue [*]Correct final battle location [*]Correct npcs(Agrith-Na-Na, Flambeed, Karamel, Dessourt) [*]All npcs have correct attacks, weaknesses, animations, and graphics [*]The types of gloves that show up in the chest depend on how far you get in the quest [URL=http://i41.tinypic.com/2505z6p.png](Picture)[/URL] [/list] [/list][/ul]
[b]Melee:[/b] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/245adt2.jpg[/img]
[b]Mage:[/b] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2yw5piq.jpg[/img]
[b]Range:[/b] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/ivza5x.jpg[/img]
[b]General Store:[/b] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/r8xdug.jpg[/img]
[b]Level 1 Clue Rewards:[/b] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/jkeyw1.jpg[/img]
[b]Level 2 Clue Rewards:[/b] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2po3amg.jpg[/img]
[b]Level 3 Clue Rewards:[/b] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2lt91v.jpg[/img]
[b]Traveling[/b] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/984i6a.png[/img]
[b]Recipe for Disaster[/b] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2505z6p.png[/img]
[b]Server Videos:[/b] Traveling(Outdated; Traveling locations were a test): [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=30xaade&s=5]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=30xaade&s=5[/url]
Thieving: [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=8x60hw&s=5]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=8x60hw&s=5[/url]
[SIZE=36pt][COLOR=blue][B][U]Impact Client 2.0:[/U][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE] The Impact 2.0 client is based off of Galkon's Refactored base, it looks very good with very minimal bugs. I plan to keep the 474 style of gameplay and not use anything higher than that. I will definitely be adding a webclient to the forums.
[B]Client Pictures:[/b] Client Background: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2rrtkee.png[/img]
Sidebar Interfaces: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/14np6rc.png[/img]
New Trade and Shop Interfaces: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/14xl5pt.png[/img]
[SIZE=36pt][COLOR=blue][B][U]Impact 2.0 Forums:[/U][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE] The forums url will stay the same it has always been, but for the 2.0 update I will be redoing a good part of the forums. A new variety of skins will be added along with some new updates to the forums. There will be a webclient and I will be working on highscores for the server.
[SIZE=36pt][COLOR=blue][B][U]Closing:[/U][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE] Impact 2.0 is still far from release, but do not worry. I work on Impact 2.0 every day and I try to make at least one update or one bug fix a day. I work on the client a lot as well so it will look its best. Impact 2.0 will have a short beta before its released of mainly staff members and veteran players. I do not have a planned release for Impact 2.0 as there is still a lot of work to be done, but a rough estimate would be anywhere from a month to two months.
Credits:
[ul][*]Core [list] [*]Impact Owner [/list] [*]Hayzie [list] [*]Creator of Emulous [/list] [*]Lmctruck30 [list] [*]Stability help and bug fixes [*]Creator of Riotscape [/list] [*]Hunter [list] [*]Graphics [/list] [*]Galkon [list] [*]Creator of Galkon's Refactored Base [*]Client tutorials [/list] [*]Sir Stewie [list] [*]Client help [*]Client tutorials [/list] [*]Impact Staff Team [list] [*]All of your help [/list][/ul]

item.title: Impact 2.0
item.dc:creator: @iant066 iant066
item.description:
@iant066 wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:7, topic:336985”][quote author=Rixxx link=topic=433395.msg3182214#msg3182214 date=1271422507]
What do you mean by holding 2K players? Having 2000 connections simultaneously?
[/quote]
yes, he means having 2000 people on at once, riotscape by lmctruck30, was quite nearly 2/3 as stable as hyperion at least.[/quote]

not as stable as hyperion but one of the more stable sources out there. Me and lmctruck30 are actually really good friends and he used to be apart of the Impact team before he went to college. He was the stability guy

Read full topic

item.title: Impact 2.0
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

Rixxx:

What do you mean by holding 2K players? Having 2000 connections simultaneously?

yes, he means having 2000 people on at once, riotscape by lmctruck30, was quite nearly 2/3 as stable as hyperion at least.

item.title: Impact 2.0
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“iant066, post:3, topic:336985”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=433395.msg3182039#msg3182039 date=1271392228]
Looks absolutely fantastic. And from knowledge I know Emulous stability is extremely good. Best of luck to you.
[/quote]

Actually the original Emulous stability is shit, it crashes at 60 people. This has mina networking added to it, and it can hold 2k players.[/quote]
What do you mean by holding 2K players? Having 2000 connections simultaneously?

Read full topic

@iant066 wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[SIZE=36pt][COLOR=blue]Introduction:[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Welcome to Impact 2.0! Impact 2.0 is based off of Impact - The next generation, and with this new Impact comes a new type of server. In Impact 2.0 I’m trying to replicate Runescape in the 420 era, but with small twists here and there. The server will have a lot of minigames, a lot of Runescape training areas, and most runescape skills.

[SIZE=36pt][COLOR=blue]Impact 2.0:[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Impact 2.0 is being shaped in to the ‘fun’ runescape we all used to remember, but easier. All exp will be RuneScape exp * xp multiplier, I have not decided the value of multiplying xp yet but it will be fairly easier then hard. Most npc training areas will be how they are in RuneScape. Most minigames and quests will have RuneScape content in them and skills will be how you do them in Runescape. Below I will go in depth on the detail of the server.

Server Progress:

[ul][]Skills
[list]
[]Runecrafting
[list]
[]Added the Abyss
[]All rifts teleport you to the correct ruins for that rune
[]All rune levels, xp, and multipliers exact to RuneScape
[/list]
[]Agility

[]All correct animations for each obstacle.
[]All correct exp to RuneScape
[/list]
[]Thieving
[list]
[]All available stalls added

[/list]
[]Crafting

[]All correct exp and levels for gem cutting
[]Hide tanning and leather tanning
[]Hide crafting
[/list]
[]Fletching

[]All arrow shafting and arrow head/feather attaching
[]Bow stringing

[/list]
[]Slayer

[/list]
[]Fishing

[]Shrimp, trout, lobster, swordfish, shark, and manta ray’s added
[]All correct requirements(trout requires feathers), levels, exp, and emotes to RuneScape
[/list]
[]Cooking

[]All correct levels and exp to RuneScape

[]Woodcutting

[SIZE=36pt][COLOR=blue]Impact Client 2.0:[/COLOR][/SIZE]
The Impact 2.0 client is based off of Galkon’s Refactored base, it looks very good with very minimal bugs. I plan to keep the 474 style of gameplay and not use anything higher than that. I will definitely be adding a webclient to the forums.

Client Pictures:

[SIZE=36pt][COLOR=blue]Impact 2.0 Forums:[/COLOR][/SIZE]
The forums url will stay the same it has always been, but for the 2.0 update I will be redoing a good part of the forums. A new variety of skins will be added along with some new updates to the forums. There will be a webclient and I will be working on highscores for the server.

[SIZE=36pt][COLOR=blue]Closing:[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Impact 2.0 is still far from release, but do not worry. I work on Impact 2.0 every day and I try to make at least one update or one bug fix a day. I work on the client a lot as well so it will look its best. Impact 2.0 will have a short beta before its released of mainly staff members and veteran players. I do not have a planned release for Impact 2.0 as there is still a lot of work to be done, but a rough estimate would be anywhere from a month to two months.
